title: HTML5 Player DRM Demo
subtitle: DRM â€“ Flexibility
description:
Each browser has inherent limitations in the fragmented DRM ecosystem. The VisualOn HTML5 Player makes it easier to target the necessary DRM for a multi-DRM content object. Our player also identifies the browser type and selects the suitable DRM automatically.

Click here to learn more about Multi-DRM.

The following video is DRM protected and VisualOn HTML5 Player automatically selects the needed DRM for your browser.
